meanings.definition: relating to or characteristic of uredium
meanings.sent1: The uredial growth on the plant was a sign of infection.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the uredial patterns to understand the disease better.
meanings.sent3: The uredial color of the leaves made them look like they were blushing.
meanings.sent4: The uredial markings on the petals resembled intricate lacework.
meanings.sent5: The uredial smell in the air signaled the presence of the rust fungus.

meanings.definition: of or relating to the uredospore of a rust fungus
meanings.sent1: The uredial spores spread easily in the wind, causing further contamination.
meanings.sent2: The farmer sprayed the affected crops to prevent the uredial spores from multiplying.
meanings.sent3: The uredial spores danced in the air like tiny, unwanted guests at a party.
meanings.sent4: The field was covered in a blanket of uredial spores, like a dusting of snow.
meanings.sent5: The microscope revealed the intricate structure of the uredial spores.
